data.question: What is the effective pore size of the channels in the synthesized microporous materials?
Which metals were used as the metal centers in the synthesis of microporous materials?
What role does DMF play in the synthesis of microporous materials?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent and possibly as a template in the crystallization process.

data.question: Is the framework structure of Co(II) formate retained after the evacuation of DMF?
What technique was explored as an alternative to thermal activation for extracting guest molecules?
What is the maximum hydrogen uptake at room temperature and 70 bar for Co(II) formate?
Does the synthesized microporous material exhibit three-dimensional spontaneous magnetic ordering?
What is the isosteric heat of hydrogen adsorption for Co(II) formate at low coverage?
Can the synthesized materials potentially separate ethylbenzene and p-xylene?
What is the main controlling factor for hydrocarbon adsorption in the synthesized materials?
Is the magnetic ordering in Mn(II) formate described as canted antiferromagnetic?
What is the role of formate in the structure of the synthesized materials?
data.answer: Formate acts as a ligand connecting the metal centers.

data.question: Did the synthesis of Co(II) formate result in purely the microporous phase?
What is the reported decomposition product of Co(II) formate upon heating?
Is the magnetic behavior of Ni(II) formate intermediate between Mn(II) and Co(II) formates?
What is the main feature of the magnetic properties shared by Mn, Co, and Ni formates?
data.answer: Antiferromagnetic intra-chain coupling and ferromagnetic inter-chain coupling

data.question: Was thermal hysteresis observed in the magnetic susceptibility measurements for Co(II) formate?
What is the significance of the Weiss constant in the context of magnetic measurements?
data.answer: It indicates the dominant type of magnetic interaction among the metal ions.

data.question: Does the synthesized microporous material have potential applications in gas storage?
What is the role of extensive dative bonding in the synthesized materials?
data.answer: It contributes to the thermal stability and retention of porosity after guest removal.
